sentence.text: At precisely the time that the Party leadership was extolling the horse as a modern and fuel-saving means of transport , it was also planning to increase the journey-times of the rural population and make them more dependent on motor transport -- or perhaps to shorten the time they had left to themselves , to sleep , think and so on .
